title: Aadhar Housing Finance aims 20% AUM growth in FY25
description: Aadhar, 76% owned by Blackstone Group Company BCP Topco VII Pte, has a robust asset quality with gross non-performing assets being at just a tad over 1% at the end of March. That compares with 1.16% a year ago.
